long_description: The Riverside SUP carrier kit is a stable, easy-to-use and budget-friendly choice for carrying your sit-on-top kayak or stand up paddleboard to your favorite paddle spot. Riverside SUP/SOT Universal Cartop blocks are compatible with factory racks, no rack, and after-market roof racks. Simply place your SOT (sit-on-top) or SUP on the foam blocks, and secure to roof of vehicle. Sticky laminate surface keeps blocks in place. Carrier kit includes two 31 in. SUP/SOT blocks and two 23 in. stacker blocks, two 15 ft. heavy duty utility straps and a 19 ft. block strap. The Riverside SUP carrier transports 1 or 2 boards.
short_description: The Riverside SUP carrier kit is a stable, easy-to-use and budget-friendly choice for carrying your sit-on-top kayak or stand up paddleboard to your favorite paddle spot.
